name: Mushrun (itch) (Pixel Poet Games)
description:
This Game was created in ten days for the 8 bits to infinity Mouse Jam with the restriction that the game is playable with just a mouse.

Controls and Credits are in Game.

Tip: I recommend scrolling just one time if you want to jump, because else it can cause a bug wich lets you jump higher (this doesnt happen often, so you cant really controll it).
